title: Trent Alexander-Arnold lands first assist in Real Madrid shirt following transfer from Liverpool (Video)
description: The time Trent Alexander-Arnold spent at Liverpool was marked by numerous pin-point assists, and the England international continues in the same style for Real Madrid.
